description: Date of metric recording
Unique identifier for emergency department

calculation: Sum of patient arrivals for the month
description: Total number of patient arrivals in the month

calculation: Aggregated from daily patient logs, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Daily count of patient arrivals (JSON format)
Average waiting time (arrival to first treatment) in minutes (monthly)

calculation: Aggregated daily averages from ED system
description: Daily average waiting times (JSON format)

calculation: Mean time from ED entry to first doctor seen
description: Average time from door to doctor in minutes

calculation: Mean time spent by patients in ED
description: Average length of stay in ED (monthly)

calculation: Aggregated daily stay durations, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Daily length of stay in ED (JSON format)

calculation: (# Left Without Being Seen / Total ED Patients) * 100
description: Left Without Being Seen (LWBS) rate (%)

calculation: (# Admitted from ED / Total ED Patients) * 100
description: Percentage of ED patients admitted to inpatient

calculation: Proportions of patients by acuity level (Level 1â€“5)
description: Distribution of patient acuity levels (JSON format)

calculation: Mean time to administer pain medication
description: Time to first pain management (in minutes)

calculation: Mean time to first ECG post-arrival
description: Time to first ECG (in minutes)
Rate of repeat visits to ED (%)
Patient satisfaction score (scale of 1â€“5)
Emergency bed utilization rate (%)
ED staff utilization rate (%)
The reporting month for inpatient metrics
Unique identifier for the ward or unit
Average percentage of beds occupied during the month

calculation: Estimated daily occupancy percentages, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Dictionary of daily bed occupancy rates

calculation: Total Patient Days / Number of Discharges
description: Average inpatient length of stay in days
Percentage of patients readmitted within 30 days
Healthcare-associated infection rate per 1,000 patient days
Percentage of inpatient deaths
Rate of patient admissions and discharges relative to capacity

calculation: Mean discharge processing time per patient
description: Average time in minutes to complete patient discharge
Average number of nurses per patient
Rate of medication errors per 1,000 patient days

calculation: Sum of Daily Patient Count / Days in Month
description: Average number of inpatients present per day

calculation: Estimated daily patient census, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Dictionary of daily inpatient census counts
Percentage of patients discharged earlier than planned
Average score from patient satisfaction surveys (1â€“5 scale)
The reporting month for outpatient metrics
Unique identifier for the outpatient clinic or department

calculation: Sum of daily outpatient visit counts
description: Total number of outpatient visits in the month

calculation: Estimated daily values derived from operational data; may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Dictionary of estimated daily outpatient visit counts
Percentage of scheduled appointments missed by patients

calculation: Total Consultation Time / Number of Consultations
description: Average time in minutes spent per outpatient consultation
Percentage of visits that resulted in a referral to a specialist

calculation: Average time from check-in to consultation
description: Average patient wait time in minutes before seeing a provider
Percentage of follow-up visits completed within recommended period
Average patient satisfaction score (1â€“5 scale)

calculation: Average turnaround time from test order to result delivery
description: Average time in hours to return diagnostic test results
Percentage of outpatient consultations conducted via telehealth
Date of metric measurement
Type/category of surgery (e.g., GEN, ORTH, NEU, etc.)

calculation: Sum of daily surgery counts for the month
description: Total number of surgeries performed in the month

calculation: Aggregated from daily surgery logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Dictionary with daily count of surgeries (JSON format)
Percentage of surgeries cancelled

calculation: Mean time from start to end of surgery
description: Average duration of surgeries in minutes
Rate of surgical site infections
Rate of patients returning unexpectedly after surgery
Post-surgery mortality rate
Rate of surgeries requiring blood transfusion
Percentage of surgeries that started on time
Rate of complications after surgery

calculation: Mean hospital stay in days after surgery
description: Average length of stay (in days) post-surgery
Date of metric recording
Type of imaging modality (e.g., MRI, CT, XRAY, US, NM)

calculation: Sum of daily study counts for the month
description: Total number of radiology studies performed in the month

calculation: Aggregated from daily imaging logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging
description: Dictionary with daily count of radiology studies performed (JSON format)

calculation: Average time from study to report availability
description: Average turnaround time to generate radiology reports (in hours)
Accuracy rate of radiology reports
Average radiation dose delivered per study (in milliSieverts)

calculation: (Time Equipment in Use / Total Time Available) * 100
description: Utilization rate of radiology equipment

calculation: Mean wait time per patient before imaging
description: Average time patients wait before imaging (in minutes)
Percentage of studies repeated due to quality or technical issues

calculation: (# Emergency Scans Completed in Time / Total Emergency Requests) * 100
description: Percentage of emergency imaging completed within target time
The reporting month for lab metrics
Category or department of lab tests (e.g., HEMA, BIOC)
Total number of lab tests performed in the month

calculation: Estimated daily test volumes; values may be fractional due to averaging or smoothing
description: Dictionary of daily lab test counts

calculation: Total Time to Report / Number of Tests
description: Average turnaround time in hours for lab test results
Percentage of tests with errors

calculation: (Critical Results Reported on Time / Total Critical Results) * 100
description: Percentage of critical lab values reported within target time

calculation: Sum of downtime incidents for lab equipment
description: Total hours lab equipment was non-operational
Percentage of samples rejected due to quality or procedural issues
Percentage of admitted patients who received at least one lab test
Date of metric measurement
Category/type of medication dispensed (e.g., ORAL, INJ, ONC)
Percentage of errors during medication dispensing

calculation: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory
description: Rate at which inventory is cycled (Inventory Turnover)
Percentage of medications dispensed that are generics

calculation: (# Out of Stock Occurrences / Total Requests) * 100
description: Percentage of times medication stock was unavailable

Percentage of adverse drug reactions reported
